statements.quote: And as soon as we announced -- you know, you look at this arena. You know, the media -- the "fake news", I call it, the worst. Fake news! They won't show this. You know, they'll say, "Donald Trump spoke before a small crowd in Alabama last night. It was a small crowd, very unenthusiastic crowd. It was a terrible evening." No, these are the most -- among the most dishonest people, I really mean it. These are among the most dishonest. For instance, look at the crowd; I'd love to have them show the crowd but they don't show the crowd. They show me. The whole night.
The only time they show the crowds is when there's a disrupter or an anarchist in the room.
Just leaving Florida. Big crowds of enthusiastic supporters lining the road that the FAKE NEWS media refuses to mention. Very dishonest!
They never show crowds like that. Look at that, it goes all the way back. They never show crowds. They don't show crowds.

name: the media doesn't cover Trump crowd sizes
